scholarship_name: L’Oréal India For Young Women in Science Scholarship
gpa_requirement: Minimum 85% in Class 12 (PCM/PCB/PCMB)
brief_description: Supports young women to pursue a career in science. For students with family income less than ₹6 Lakhs. Provides a scholarship amount of up to ₹2,50,000.
deadline: The 2024 deadline was in October. Check the official website for 2025 dates.

gpa_requirement: For students from West Bengal with ≥85% in state board or ≥90% in central board.
brief_description: Provides financial support to meritorious students from West Bengal with a family income of less than ₹3 Lakhs. Offers ₹50,000 per year.
deadline: Typically closes around July each year. Check the website for the 2025 application period.

gpa_requirement: Varies by course and category (e.g., minimum 70% for B.E./B.Tech).
brief_description: A merit-cum-means based scholarship for a wide range of courses. Provides between ₹6,000 to ₹38,400 per year.
deadline: Applications are accepted throughout the year.

providing_body: Department of Science & Technology (DST), Government of India
gpa_requirement: Among the top 1% in Class 12 board exams or a top rank in JEE/NEET.
brief_description: Aims to attract talented youth to study science. Provides an annual scholarship of ₹80,000.
deadline: October 31, 2025

scholarship_name: UGC Ishan Uday Scholarship for North Eastern Region
gpa_requirement: For students from the North Eastern Region with a family income below ₹4.5 Lakhs.
brief_description: Promotes higher education for students from the NER. Offers ₹5,400 to ₹7,800 per month.
deadline: October 31, 2025

gpa_requirement: Minimum 60% in Class 12.
brief_description: A merit-cum-means scholarship for first-year undergraduate students with a family income of up to ₹15 Lakhs. Provides up to ₹2 Lakhs for the entire course.
deadline: Typically closes in July. Check the website for the 2025 deadline.

gpa_requirement: Minimum 60% in the previous qualifying exam.
brief_description: Supports students from underprivileged families with an income below ₹6 Lakhs. Provides up to ₹2 Lakhs per year.

scholarship_name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship for College and University Students
providing_body: Ministry of Education, Government of India
gpa_requirement: Above 80th percentile in Class 12 board exams.
brief_description: For meritorious students from families with an income below ₹4.5 Lakhs. Offers ₹12,000 to ₹20,000 per year.
deadline: October 31, 2025

providing_body: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
gpa_requirement: Must be admitted to the first year of a technical course.
brief_description: Empowers young women in technical education with family income less than ₹8 Lakhs. Provides ₹50,000 per year.
deadline: October 31, 2025

gpa_requirement: Minimum 85% in Class 12.
brief_description: Supports meritorious girl students from families with an income below ₹6 Lakhs. Provides up to ₹1.5 Lakhs per year.
deadline: The 2024 deadline was in April. Check the website for the 2025 application cycle.

providing_body: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)
gpa_requirement: Must have qualified NET.
brief_description: A fellowship for pursuing a PhD in education and related disciplines. Provides ₹23,000 to ₹25,000 per month.
deadline: Usually announced in the last quarter of the year. Check the website for 2025 dates.

providing_body: Council of Scientific & Industrial Research (CSIR) / UGC
gpa_requirement: Must have qualified the CSIR-UGC NET exam.
brief_description: A prestigious fellowship for pursuing research in scientific disciplines. Provides ₹31,000 to ₹35,000 per month plus a contingency grant.
deadline: The NET exam is conducted twice a year, typically in June and December.

providing_body: Department of Biotechnology (DBT), Government of India
gpa_requirement: Must have qualified the Biotechnology Eligibility Test (BET).
brief_description: A fellowship to promote research in biotechnology. Offers ₹25,000 to ₹28,000 per month plus HRA.
deadline: The BET exam is typically held in April.

gpa_requirement: Minimum 8.0 CGPA for direct entry from specified institutions.
brief_description: A fellowship for pursuing doctoral research at top institutions like IISc, IITs, and IISERs. Offers ₹70,000 to ₹80,000 per month plus a ₹2 Lakhs research contingency.
deadline: Applications are typically open twice a year. Check the website for specific 2025 deadlines.

gpa_requirement: Must belong to a notified minority community.
brief_description: Provides integrated five-year fellowships for students from minority communities. Offers ₹31,000 to ₹35,000 per month plus HRA. (Note: Scheme was discontinued in 2022, check for any updates or new schemes).
deadline: Scheme discontinued. Refer to the Ministry's website for alternatives.

scholarship_name: Tata Trusts Means Grant for College
gpa_requirement: Based on financial need.
brief_description: Provides financial aid to students residing in Mumbai or its suburbs for their college education.
deadline: The application period is usually between July and August. The tentative deadline is August 2025.

gpa_requirement: Minimum 60% in the qualifying examination.
brief_description: Supports meritorious SC/ST/OBC/EWS students with a family income below ₹4.5 Lakhs. Provides ₹48,000 per year.
deadline: Typically closes in July. Check the website for the 2025 deadline.

gpa_requirement: Varies by specific scholarship scheme.
brief_description: A portal hosting multiple scholarships funded by various corporates. Eligibility and amounts vary widely.
deadline: Rolling deadlines for different schemes. Check the portal regularly.

scholarship_name: Dr. Ambedkar Post-Matric Scholarship for EBC Students
gpa_requirement: For students from Economically Backward Classes (EBC).
brief_description: Provides financial assistance including tuition fees and maintenance allowance to EBC students for post-matriculation studies.
deadline: December 31, 2025

gpa_requirement: Minimum 50% in the previous exam.
brief_description: For students from minority communities with a family income below ₹2 Lakhs. Offers up to ₹10,000 per year.
deadline: October 31, 2025

gpa_requirement: For permanent residents of Jharkhand belonging to SC, ST, or OBC categories.
brief_description: Provides financial aid to students from Jharkhand for their post-matriculation studies. Offers up to ₹25,000 per year.
deadline: September 30, 2025

gpa_requirement: Minimum 75% in MP Board or 85% in CBSE/ICSE Class 12.
brief_description: For meritorious students of Madhya Pradesh with family income less than ₹6 Lakhs. Covers full tuition fees.
deadline: Typically closes in July. Check the portal for 2025 dates.

gpa_requirement: Minimum 80th percentile in Class 12.
brief_description: For meritorious students of Gujarat with a family income below ₹6 Lakhs. Provides up to ₹1 Lakh per year.
deadline: Typically closes in July. Check the portal for 2025 dates.

gpa_requirement: For students in their final year of UG/PG studies.
brief_description: A two-month fellowship to work on a research project with IITM faculty. Provides a stipend of ₹6,000 per month.
deadline: The 2025 application deadline is in March 2025.

providing_body: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER) Pune
gpa_requirement: For students currently in their 2nd, 3rd, or 4th year of BSc/BS-MS.
brief_description: A summer research program for students to work with IISER Pune faculty. Provides a stipend and travel expenses.
deadline: The 2025 application deadline is in March 2025.

gpa_requirement: For Scheduled Tribe students who have passed their postgraduate examination.
brief_description: Provides financial assistance for higher education (M.Phil/PhD). Offers ₹28,000 to ₹35,000 per month plus HRA.
deadline: Check the website for the 2025 application cycle announcement.

gpa_requirement: First class in postgraduate degree and under 35 years of age.
brief_description: A two-year scholarship for PhD research in specified fields. Provides ₹18,000 per month plus a ₹15,000 contingency.

gpa_requirement: A Master's degree in a relevant field.
brief_description: A fully funded scholarship for students from SAARC member states to pursue a PhD in agriculture and related fields.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in September 2025.

providing_body: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
gpa_requirement: Must have a valid GATE or GPAT score.
brief_description: Provides a monthly stipend to full-time GATE/GPAT qualified students admitted to AICTE approved postgraduate programs. Offers ₹12,400 per month.
deadline: October 31, 2025

scholarship_name: Ishan Uday Special Scholarship Scheme for NER
gpa_requirement: For students from the North Eastern Region.
brief_description: A special scholarship to promote higher education in the North Eastern Region. Provides ₹5,400 to ₹7,800 per month.
deadline: November 30, 2025

gpa_requirement: Minimum 60% in Class 10 or 12.
brief_description: A merit-based scholarship for students from SJVN project areas. Provides ₹2,000 per month.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in August 2025.

gpa_requirement: For first-year students with a family income below ₹4.5 Lakhs.
brief_description: A scholarship to support girl students pursuing higher education. Provides ₹48,000 per year.
deadline: Typically closes in July. Check the website for the 2025 deadline.

scholarship_name: HDFC Bank Educational Crisis Scholarship Support
gpa_requirement: For students facing a personal or financial crisis.
brief_description: Provides timely financial assistance to students to prevent dropouts. Offers ₹10,000 to ₹75,000.
deadline: Rolling applications. The portal opens at different times of the year.

providing_body: Foundation for Academic Excellence and Access (FAEA)
gpa_requirement: For students who have passed Class 12 and have a financial need.
brief_description: A scholarship that covers full tuition fees and other living expenses for socially and economically disadvantaged students.

field_of_study: All fields offered by the university
gpa_requirement: Based on financial need after securing admission.
brief_description: Offers need-based scholarships ranging from 25% to 100% tuition fee waiver.
deadline: The application is part of the admission process, which typically closes in July.

scholarship_name: Swami Vivekananda Merit Cum Means Scholarship (SVMCM)
gpa_requirement: Minimum 60% marks in the qualifying exam.
brief_description: For meritorious and needy students of West Bengal. Provides ₹12,000 to ₹60,000 per year.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in September 2025.

gpa_requirement: Minimum 85% marks and a strong interest in scientific research.
brief_description: A scholarship to encourage young women to pursue a career in science. Provides ₹2.4 Lakhs over three years.
deadline: Typically closes in July. Check the website for the 2025 deadline.

gpa_requirement: For meritorious students from Karnataka with a family income below ₹1 Lakh.
brief_description: Provides financial support to deserving students from Karnataka for higher education.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in July 2025.

gpa_requirement: For students from West Bengal with a minimum of 85% marks.
brief_description: A merit-based scholarship providing ₹50,000 per year to students from West Bengal.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in July 2025.

gpa_requirement: Based on merit.
brief_description: An interest-free loan scholarship for meritorious students pursuing higher education. Offers ₹2,500 to ₹25,000 per year.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in July 2025.

scholarship_name: Top Class Education Scheme for SC Students
gpa_requirement: For SC students who have secured admission in notified top-class institutions.
brief_description: A comprehensive scholarship that covers full tuition fees and provides up to ₹2.2 Lakhs for other expenses.
deadline: October 31, 2025

gpa_requirement: For students who have passed Class 8 with a family income below ₹3.5 Lakhs.
brief_description: A scholarship to reduce the dropout rate at the secondary stage. Provides ₹12,000 per year.
deadline: October 2025

gpa_requirement: For students of Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas (JNVs) pursuing a degree at an IIT or NIT.
brief_description: A scholarship that covers tuition, hostel, and mess expenses up to ₹2 Lakhs per year.
deadline: The 2025 deadline is expected to be in August 2025.

gpa_requirement: A good academic record.
brief_description: An interest-free loan scholarship for Indian nationals planning to pursue higher studies abroad. Offers ₹1 Lakh to ₹10 Lakhs.
deadline: March 2025

field_of_study: All fields (except some specified; for study abroad)
gpa_requirement: A good first degree from a recognized Indian university.
brief_description: A scholarship for young Indians under 30 to study at top-rated institutions in the US, UK, and Europe. Offers up to $100,000.
deadline: February 2025

field_of_study: Various fields (for study in the US)
gpa_requirement: A four-year bachelor's degree and relevant work experience.
brief_description: A fully funded fellowship for outstanding Indians to pursue a master's degree at select US universities.
deadline: June 2025
